body:
Former Texas Gov. Rick Perry is suspending his presidential campaign, becoming the first in the crowded Republican field to bow out. 
The longest-serving governor in Texas history planned to announce his decision during a speech Friday night in St. Louis before conservative activists. 
The Associated Press contributed to this report.
description: Former Texas Gov. Rick Perry is suspending his presidential campaign, becoming the first in the crowded Republican field to bow out.
title: Perry suspends presidential campaign
